body.p: State of Ohio Scioto County ss,

John C. Adams of lawful age being by me first duly sworn according to law deposeth and saith that on Arch Means against whom a requisition was issued by the Governor of the State of Illinois on the Governor of the state of Ohio, and who was there living in the State of Ohio, has removed to and now resides in the State of Kentucky, affiant states that the said Arch Means has removed his residence to said State of Kentucky for the Express purpose of avoiding being arrested under said requisition and that said Arch Means cannot now be arrested unless by requisition from the Governor of Illinois upon the Governor of Kentucky, and further saith not,
Sworn to and subscribed by the said John. C. Adams before me and in my presence this the 8th day of April AD 1864,

Adam Kerr Mayor of
the City of Portsmouth, O
SEAL OF THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH
OHIO
